## Source: ossf-package-analysis (ee67391763ebd7c109cabbd8b6e3f144a97ee89a4bd2e9d4738b65a542d924d3)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'littelbitx0' @ 1.1.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
